body_html: I have weak signal that it's OK because the CI makes use of it, and https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda9-cudnn7-py2-trigger/5770/ appears to have worked correctly. Do you know an easy way to get more signal? (e.g., is there an easy way to poke at the built binary and tell which architectures it has?)
